model.ruby_template:

model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    h_temp <- getLine
    let h = map read $ words h_temp :: [Int]
    word <- getLine

getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Help finding selection area in PDF Viewer.
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    H = read_array(26,"~d"),
    { ok, [Word]} = io:fread("", "~s"),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
h = {}
h_temp = io.read()
h_i = 1;
for token in string.gmatch(h_temp, "[^%s]+") do
	h[h_i] = token
	h_i = h_i + 1
end
word = io.read()
